tool_description: Your source for up-to-date news on (wo)man's best friend!
name: Daily Dog News
title: Daily Dog News

api_list.name: Get Individual Dog News Source
api_list.description: Get dog news from specific sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-dog-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/ap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-dog-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-dog-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-dog-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Dog News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about dogs from all over the globe.
